trans-unit.source: Installs and configures assemblies in the COM+ catalog.
trans-unit.target: 安裝及設定 COM + 目錄中的組件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: RegistrationHelper is used by both the .NET Services Installation Tool (Regsvcs.exe) and the automatic registration steps that are performed on first activation of a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>.
trans-unit.target: .NET 服務安裝工具 (Regsvcs.exe) 和第一個啟動<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>所執行的自動註冊步驟會使用 RegistrationHelper

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Installs the named assembly in a COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 安裝 COM + 應用程式中的具名組件。

trans-unit.source: InstallAssembly performs the following steps: registration, generation of a type library, registration of the type library, installation of the type library under the specified application, and configuration of the components contained in the type library.
trans-unit.target: InstallAssembly 執行下列步驟︰ 登錄、 產生類型程式庫、 註冊類型程式庫、 安裝指定的應用程式與組態中包含的元件類型程式庫 下的類型程式庫。

trans-unit.source: This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求呼叫端在本機電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝的組件檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the COM+ application to install into.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝 COM + 應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and the assembly contains a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationNameAttribute"></xref>, then the attribute is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>和組件包含<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationNameAttribute"> </xref>，則會使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the name of the application is generated based on the name of the assembly, then is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，應用程式名稱根據組件名稱產生，則會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output Type Library Exporter (Tlbexp.exe) file, or a string that contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the registration helper is expected to generate the name.
trans-unit.target: 輸出名稱類型程式庫匯出工具 (Tlbexp.exe) 檔案或字串，包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果註冊協助預期要產生的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The actual name used is placed in the parameter on call completion.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實際名稱被放在呼叫完成時的參數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The input assembly does not have a strong name.
trans-unit.target: 輸入組件沒有強式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Installs the named assembly in a COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 安裝 COM + 應用程式中的具名組件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper.InstallAssembly%2A> performs the following steps: registration, generation of a type library, registration of the type library, installation of the type library under the specified application, and configuration of the components contained in the type library.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper.InstallAssembly%2A>執行下列步驟︰ 登錄、 產生類型程式庫、 註冊類型程式庫、 安裝指定的應用程式與組態中包含的元件類型程式庫 下的類型程式庫。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper.InstallAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求呼叫端在本機電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝的組件檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the COM+ application to install into.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝 COM + 應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and the assembly contains a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationNameAttribute"></xref>, then the attribute is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>和組件包含<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationNameAttribute"> </xref>，則會使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the name of the application is generated based on the name of the assembly, then is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否則，應用程式名稱根據組件名稱產生，則會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The name of the partition.
trans-unit.target: 資料分割的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output Type Library Exporter (Tlbexp.exe) file, or a string that contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the registration helper is expected to generate the name.
trans-unit.target: 輸出名稱類型程式庫匯出工具 (Tlbexp.exe) 檔案或字串，包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果註冊協助預期要產生的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The actual name used is placed in the parameter on call completion.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實際名稱被放在呼叫完成時的參數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The input assembly does not have a strong name.
trans-unit.target: 輸入組件沒有強式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Installs the named assembly in a COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 安裝 COM + 應用程式中的具名組件。

trans-unit.source: This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求呼叫端在本機電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationConfig"></xref> identifying the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationConfig"> </xref>識別要安裝的組件。

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the assembly from the given application.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的應用程式會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 若要解除安裝組件檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this name is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, it is the name of the application that contains the components in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果此名稱不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，這是包含組件中的元件的應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The input assembly does not have a strong name.
trans-unit.target: 輸入組件沒有強式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the assembly from the given application.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的應用程式會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 若要解除安裝組件檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this name is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, it is the name of the application that contains the components in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果此名稱不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，這是包含組件中的元件的應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the partition.
trans-unit.target: 資料分割的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The input assembly does not have a strong name.
trans-unit.target: 輸入組件沒有強式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the assembly from the given application.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的應用程式會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationConfig"></xref> identifying the assembly to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationConfig"> </xref>識別要解除安裝組件。
